org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

Class Threshold

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.Threshold

  • public final class Threshold
extends Object
    Is the threshold to use for gauge chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IsColor DEFAULT_VALUE_COLOR
      Default color value, GaugeThreshold.NORMAL.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Threshold(String name)
      Creates a threshold with standard color (DEFAULT_VALUE_COLOR) and value (Double.MAX_VALUE).

      Creates a threshold with standard color (DEFAULT_VALUE_COLOR).
      Threshold(String name, double value, IsColor color)
      Creates a threshold
      Threshold(String name, IsColor color)
      Creates a threshold with standard value (Double.MAX_VALUE).
